content: left hand m1r - make one round 4 *k3 p1* repeat around right - lift loop between stitches from the back knit into front of loop rnds 5 - 8 work as rnds 1 - 4 p - purl repeat - repeat rh - right hand round - round ssk - slip 2 stitches rnds 9 - 10 *k3 p1* repeat around individually as if to knit then knit them together through the back round 11 *lt k1 p1* repeat around loops st sts - stitch stitches ** - repeat as noted between asterisks round 12 *k3 p1* repeat around round 13 *k1 lt p1* repeat around empowering beanie by justyna lorkowska - lete s knits c 2022 all rights reserved for personal use only round 14 *k3 p1* repeat around finishing rnds 15 - 18 work as rnds 11 -14 cut yarns and pull through remaining live stitches and pull taut closing the rnds 19 - 20 *k3 p1* repeat around hole weave in ends and block the hat use a balloon to block the hat by placing repeat rnds 1-20 of cable chart once more then repeat rnds 1-6 once more a partially inflated balloon inside the hat then fully inflating to required head the hat should measure about 21 5 cm/8 5 | 3 circumference do not fully inflate the balloon first then try to fit the hat over it - this will overstretch the brim attach a pompom if desired contact & support email support@justynaknits com website - http //www justynaknits com ravelry id lete ravelry group - lete s knits copyright agreement this pattern is the property of justyna lorkowska it is copyrighted and is for personal and non-profit use only this means you can knit for yourself for a gift or for charity you may not sell a hat made from this pattern you may not reproduce this pattern on or distribute it from a website this pattern may not be translated reproduced or circulated in another language downloading or printing the pattern constitutes agreement within these crown shaping terms thank you and enjoy round 1 *rt k1 p1* repeat around your round 2 *k2tog k1 p1* repeat around 81 sts empowering round 3 *k2 p1* repeat around beanie justyna round 4 *rt p1* repeat around lorkowska round 5 *k2 p1* repeat around piła poland round 6 *ssk p1* repeat around 54 sts january 2022 round 7 ssk around 27 sts round 8 k2tog around to last st k1 14 sts empowering beanie by justyna lorkowska - lete s knits c 2022 all rights reserved for personal use only
